original_text: You may work for six days each week, but the seventh day will be a holy day for you. It will be a day of complete rest to give honour to the Lord. If anyone works on that day, you must punish him with death.
korean_text: 엿새 동안은 일하고 일곱째 날은 너희를 위한 거룩한 날이니 여호와께 엄숙한 안식일이라 누구든지 이 날에 일하는 자는 죽일지니

sentences.original_text: You may work for six days each week
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 매주 여섯 동안 일할 수 있으나

sentences.original_text: but the seventh day will be a holy day for you
sentences.korean_translation: 일곱째 날은 너를 위한 거룩한 날이니라

sentences.original_text: It will be a day of complete rest
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 완전히 쉬는 날이 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: to give honour to the Lord
If anyone works on that day
you must punish him with death
